    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String playerName, VirtualView client) throws PlayerAlreadyInException, MaxPlayersInException
      Tries to add player to the current game
      Parameters:
      playerName - name of the players that needs to be added to the WaitingRoom
      client - reference to the client
      Throws:
      PlayerAlreadyInException - if a player with the same name is already in
      MaxPlayersInException - if the room is full

    • switchReady

      public void switchReady(String playerName)
      Switches the readiness of a player
      Parameters:
      playerName - of the player to set ready or unready

      private void calculateStrategy()

    • hasOneReachedRequiredPoints

      private boolean hasOneReachedRequiredPoints()
      Checks if a player has reached the required points
      Returns:
      true if a player has, false otherwise

    • areDecksEmpty

      private boolean areDecksEmpty()
      Checks if decks are empty
      Returns:
      true if both decks are, false otherwise

    • endGame

      public void endGame()
      Calculates all the points done by players, decrees a winner and set the game state to ENDED

      Parameters:

      cardId - the objective chosen by the player

      Parameters:
      playerName - of the player that want to flip the card

    • playCard

      public void playCard(String playerName, int cardId, Position position)
      Play a card
      Parameters:
      playerName - of the player who wants to play the card
      cardId - of the card that needs to be played
      position - of the player field in which the card needs to be played
